root: ^:Your goal is to learn and make as many dishes as you can.
^: Before you jump in, here are some things you should know
^: Shopkeepers provide quests for new recipes as well as ingredients to use.
^: Talk to the shopkeepers at the farmer’s market to receive new information about recipes
^: To check recipes you’ve learned, access the Recipe Book
^: Items you find will be added to your recipe book…
^: There, you can see how to use the ingredients you’ve unlocked.
^: The utility map allows you to see how an ingredient is included in recipes.
^:The recipe map allows you to see all the components of a recipe as well as the ingredients you have unlocked.
^: Use the appliances in your kitchen to make exciting recipes!
^: You can still make a dish even without knowing all of the ingredients..
